law.catch_line: Subject to the approval of the Board, the Department may use the land described in this subtitle for...
law.text: Subject to the approval of the Board, the Department may use the land described in this subtitle for conservation purposes in the manner and under the regulations the Department deems in the best interest of the State. However, any person who may lawfully hunt or fish in Worcester County may hunt or fish on these lands during the open season for hunting or fishing.
